item.title: AK Khandker, a Liberation War hero and Bangladesh's first Air Force chief, dies at 95
item.description: AK Khandker, the deputy chief of staff of the Bangladesh forces during the Liberation War and the country’s first Air Force chief, has died at the age of 95. He passed away from complications related to old age around 10:30am on Saturday, according to the Army's public relations wing ISPR.
